translations.translation: As for those who preserve themselves from evil and follow the straight path, there is attainment for them:
Surely the state of triumph awaits the God-fearing:
The pious ones will be triumphant.
Indeed the place of success is for the pious.
Verily, for those who have Taqwa, there will be a success;
Surely for those who guard (against evil) is achievement,
Surely for the godfearing awaits a place of security,
Lo! for the duteous is achievement -
As for those who are mindful of God, they shall surely triumph:
Verily for the God-fearing is an achievement.
Indeed a triumph awaits the Godwary:
Verily for the Righteous there will be a fulfilment of (the heart's) desires;
Verily, for the Muttaqun, there will be a success (Paradise);
But, for the cautious a place of prosperity,
But for the righteous there is triumph.
Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -
[78:31]   Truly for the God-fearing there will be a triumph, a place of triumph, in Paradise:
(Lo! for the duteous) for those who ward off disbelief, idolatry and indecencies (is achievement) safety from the Fire and nearness of Allah

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازاً } معناه النَّجاةُ من النَارِ
 ويقالُ: المَفازُ: المَسرةُ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثمَّ أردف سبحانه بوعيدهم وعد المؤمنين تشديداً لعذابهم وتأكيداً: { إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ } المؤمنين، المتحفظين نفوسهم عن محارم الله خوفاً من عذاب الله، ورجاءً من فضله { مَفَازاً } [النبأ: 31] مخلصاً ونجاةً من جميع المكاره اللاحقة للكفار والعصاة
